title: whatever happend to Riot member Lyte? was he fired?
body:
that's the guy who was in-charge of handling the community, but all he did was ban toxic people. ever since no one actually handled the problem, tho to be honest I don't believe that language can be a problem, when you have a mute button.

https://s3.amazonaws.com/dailydot/originals/Jeff_Lin.jpg

apparently Riot never realized that people who get upsad over flame, shouldn't be playing their game in the first place. I prefer a toxic player over a tilted cry baby any day..
